Volcanion (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0720: Hoopa
Pokémon
#0722: Rowlet →

Volcanion has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted in the Steam Siege expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Volcanion cards are normally Fire-type or Water-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Volcanion

Volcanion
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
